public class AssignExpr
extends Expr
BNF: noun ":=" expr

Changes the binding for 'noun' in the current environment to be the value of 'expr'. 'noun' must already be bound.

AssignExpr(AssignExpr, Object)
AssignExpr(String, Expr)
